data.name: Extract currencyFormat / relevant information from given currencyString
data.description:
## Task
```javascript
getCurrencyFormat(currencyString)
```
Above function should be able to extract relevant information from given (**valid**) currencyString and return and object with the following properties:

* symbol (string) - what symbol or string is used to represent the currency ex: **'$'**
* position (string) - does the symbol come before or after the value ex: **'left'** or **'right'**
* spaceBetween (boolean) - do we have a whitespace between currency ex: **true** or **false**
* thousandSeparator (string) - what character is used as a separator every 3 digits ex: **','**
* decimalMark (string) - what character is used for marking decimals ex: **'.'**

**Everything that can not be found / identified should remain default, ex: empty string / false**

## Examples
```javascript
var dollar = getCurrencyFormat('$1,234.56').symbol; // '$'
var euro = getCurrencyFormat('1.234,56 €').symbol; // '€'
```

## Helpful links on your way to the solution:

* [String.replace](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/replace)
* [String.indexOf](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/indexOf)
